description: Meaty mushrooms replace beef in this delicious vegetarian stroganoff stew.
name: Mushroom Stroganoff Stew Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large onion, peeled and finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan on medium heat. Cook the onion for 5 minutes, add the mushrooms and cook for 6-8 minutes until they release their juice and it evaporates. Stir in the garlic, soy sauce and paprika and cook for 1 minute.
Pour over the vegetable stock and simmer for 5 minutes until thickened. Remove from the heat and stir through the creme fraiche and parsley before serving.
